name: Jordan Ramirez
persona: Jordan Ramirez is a 21-year-old Business Administration major with a CGPA of 2.67. While generally motivated to achieve better grades, Jordan sometimes struggles with self-discipline and test anxiety, which can impact performance. However, Jordan demonstrates perseverance and is determined to improve academic standing, seeking out resources and support when needed. Jordan is moderately conscientious and believes in their ability to succeed, but recognizes that more consistent effort and stress management could help reach higher goals.
